name: Marlin Williams
text: Stopped in to fill a craving and left VERY satisfied!!  Place was really CLEAN and selection of pizza and salad bar was great. Staff asked us if we had any requests and full filled those quickly. Would visit again!!

name: Trani Price
text: Good pizza for the price, nice staff,and if you get the buffet, just ask for what pizza you want and they will make it.

name: Annette Abbott
text: The pizza is good, but they only put 1/2 pie out at a time.  There are usually a few other dining guests, so you don't want to take but one piece of the 1/2 pie (that's one of four slices available).  If you have a large family and expect ‚Ä¶More

name: Patriot PG
text: Very impressed. very clean restaurant .you wouldn't think so on first impression because it's attached to a convenience store albeit a nice one, off of Corley Mill Road. Great selection very fresh and hot pizza! Must try their taco pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Jenny Epting
text: üòäVery nice staff. Quiet. They offered to make a pizza if I didn't see what I wanted.

name: Simply Regal
text: The nicest staff in Lexington! Always clean and prompt service. We frequent the lunch buffet and they are always more than happy to accommodate any special requests. It's nice to have a "usual" place to meet.

name: Corey Williams
text: It was good I enjoyed it very clean very fast, the only reason I give him a four-star because I thought they had deep-dish pepperoni like I had back in the day when I was a teenager but oh well other then that I'll be back

name: Joyce Bragg
text: Great people,good food

name: Ellen Cassity
text: Buffet is great...request your favorite pizza and it's cooked to order. Family owned. Very friendly.

name: Tony Balderas
text: The food is low quality, taste decent. All the pizzas is flat bread. I say the food qualty doesn't match the price.

name: Carla Dominick
text: Owner was super nice. Store clean and food was good. Will go again.

name: Charles Walker
text:
Great food.
Charlie's Odds and Ends

name: Justin Lingle
text: It's okay. Not what it used to be but it's not bad. To be fair, none of the Pizza Inn's I've been to in the last few years have been as good as they were. Something in the recipe has changed and I can't put my finger on it. Service was great though!

name: Jim Martin
text: Nothing great. Hard working staff

name: Marina Rhinehart
text: I came here on a Tuesday at 11:30am to see only one slice of pizza on the counter so I just walked out. Typicay there are whole pizza laying on the counter but this time, there was literally only one slice.

name: Stephen Stanley
text: It is what it is. Fast pizza, buffet pizza, and salad bar. Unless you are really hungry, go for the combo and save a few bucks. Staff was very friendly. Restaurant was clean.

name: Donny Reynoso
text: Service was aight, everything else was wack! Co worker and I got a pizza buffet and there wasn't any new pizza Brought out at all!

name: Carrie Smith
text: Horrible Service in Lexington SC and even worse food! Don‚Äôt waste your money here!

name: Faith Wells
text: Best pizza for an awesome Price!

name: Bob Schneider
text: It had Pizza Inn-side.  And I was allowed to take it outside so a total win-win.  Really met 100% of expectations for pizza sold out of a gas station parking lot down from a liquor store.

name: Brett DeYoung
text: Small location but willing to please.

name: Sarah Smith
text: Disappointing. The ingredients of the taco pizza was very light considering what we get at the Lancaster SC location. We will go to that one from now on.

name: E Sckngr
text: It's not PIZZA pizza. The crust tastes kind of like crackers. That said, it was tasty.

name: Richard Baldwin
text: Pizza is decent but nothing special. Kitchen is set up weird which leads to inefficient service. They do have a few craft beers and it's convenient for the corley mill area.

name: Scott Peterson
text: Cooked my new york pan style pizza perfect both times I have eaten there. People behind the counter have been pleasant both times as well.

name: AJ Blues Productions
text: Ever since this place opened up they have served under age kids alcohol and tobacco with their sister store. And then when they got a liquor store it got even worse. these people allow high school students to come over and get f up and then ‚Ä¶More

name: Alena Brown
text: Staff was super polite had good chemistry. The restaurant is super clean and nice

name: Anthon Tucker
text: Great place to eat

name: laurelle dodson
text: Fantastic buffalo chicken and dessert pizzas! They will make anything you request as soon as you ask! Will come again.

name: Craig Mayer
text: Lousy service , no pizza on the buffet. Waste of time and money.

name: Daniel Melbourne Jr
text: I liked it a lot and food was better than I expected and is better than little ceasers. Will definitely go there again.

name: Daniel Jones
text: Great place.  Buddy talking about selling underage stuff has no idea what he's talking about.

text: Went there for the buffet and served half pizzas. Had to keep waiting on pizza couldn't keep up with the demand at lunch

text: Decent pizza, decent service.
